title: Presidential Nominations Sent to the Senate | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
May 21, 2015

 



Presidential Nominations Sent to the Senate




NOMINATIONS SENT TO THE SENATE:
Michael C. McGowan, of Delaware, to be United States Marshal for the District of Delaware for the term of four years, vice Joseph Anthony Papili, resigned.
Eric Steven Miller, of Vermont, to be United States Attorney for the District of Vermont for the term of four years, vice Tristram J. Coffin, resigned.
Edward L. Stanton III, of Tennessee, to be United States District Judge for the Western District of Tennessee, vice Samuel H. Mays, Jr., retiring.
